ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | hashuni.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) |
| 2 |  | hashuni.2 | |- ( ph -> A C_ Fin ) |
| 3 |  | hashuni.3 | |- ( ph -> Disj_ x e. A x ) |
| 4 |  | #P_uniiun | |- U. A = U_ x e. A x |
| 5 | 4 | #P_fveq2i | |- ( # ` U. A ) = ( # ` U_ x e. A x ) |
| 6 | 2 | #P_sselda | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> x e. Fin ) |
| 7 | 1, 6, 3 | #P_hashiun | |- ( ph -> ( # ` U_ x e. A x ) = sum_ x e. A ( # ` x ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( ph -> ( # ` U. A ) = sum_ x e. A ( # ` x ) ) |
